## The Cost Curve Nobody Wants to Talk About

Sovereignty does not remove cost â€” it redistributes it. This essay explains why sovereign systems front-load pain, responsibility, and discipline instead of hiding them behind convenience, and why most people rationally opt out.

Sovereignty does not remove cost â€” it redistributes it. This essay explains why sovereign systems front-load pain, responsibility, and discipline instead of hiding them behind convenience, and why most people rationally opt out.
